title: Warring kingdoms vi skin memory leak?
body: Every game that I've played with that new vi skin my fps crashes and my friends have been having the same issue. Idk what triggers it if its something to do with the dragon buffs causing a memory leak idk that's just what my friend said it could be. Never had this problem before and it only seems to happen in games with that skin but not untill like half way through the game.

replies.body:
Are you still experiencing this issue? We had some players report issues with the new *Crest of the Rooster* ward skin and their FPS, but this issue has since been resolved.

Just let me know if you're still seeing issues so we can troubleshoot this further! ^.^
